communication

Interface GameInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectGame

    public interface GameInterface
    Main game interface that should be used if a game is created to be playable through the master interface Contains basic and necessary functions that let a gui communicates with the game
    Author:
    lucas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean endGame()
      Should update the stats that weren't updated yet
      ProjectGameStats getStats()
      Get the current stats of the game like wins/loses/play count
      ProjectGame initGame(ProjectGameStats stats) 
      boolean startIntro()
      Function to setup the intro of the game if it have it

    • Method Detail

      • startIntro

        boolean startIntro()
        Function to setup the intro of the game if it have it
        Returns:
        - true if it has intro and can load it, false if fails any

      • initGame

        ProjectGame initGame(ProjectGameStats stats)
        Parameters:
        stats - - object to be used as stats, must handle the case of being null
        Returns:
        - the game with it's initialized content

      • endGame

        boolean endGame()
        Should update the stats that weren't updated yet
        Returns:
        - true if it updated correctly or doesn't need to do update, false if failed to update stats

      • getStats

        ProjectGameStats getStats()
        Get the current stats of the game like wins/loses/play count
        Returns:
        ProjectGameStats - stats of the game
